description: This Dart source file defines a TransactionProvider class, which manages transaction data including fetching, adding, removing, and filtering transactions. It integrates with an API client for backend communication and provides a state management mechanism for a Flutter application.

classes.name: TransactionProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that provides transaction data with filtering, backend integration, and state management for Flutter.

methods.name: fetchTransactions
methods.description: Fetches transactions from backend API and updates internal list, handling loading state and errors.

methods.name: addTransaction
methods.description: Adds a new transaction locally and attempts to save it to the backend API.

methods.name: removeTransaction
methods.description: Removes a transaction locally and attempts to delete it from the backend API.

methods.name: filtered
methods.description: Returns a list of transactions filtered based on provided criteria such as accountId, categoryId, date range, and type.
